name: Platform Soccer
description:
So,you are on a platform.And what is better than having fun playing football on a platform?Nothing.

Featuring cartoonish physics,cubic graphics,and a lot of work ;)

I made this game long time ago while I was travelling,that's why I decided to add some features that will be:

  • Up to 4 players on the same computer.
  • Choosing match lenght by time.
  • Choosing the colors.

NB:This game is designed to be played with AZERTY keyboards,so if you want to play with WASD just change your keyboard layout in your computer settings to a french keyboard.
